test-case.name: testResolvePrice with data set "Single variant at price 0.00 (float), should return 0.00 (float)"
testResolvePrice with data set "Single variant at price 5 (integer), should return 5.00 (float)"
testResolvePrice with data set "Single variants at price null (null), should return 0.00 (float)"
testResolvePrice with data set "Multiple variants at price 0, 10, 20, should return 0.00 (float)"
testResolvePrice with data set "Multiple variants at price 10, 0, 20, should return 0.00 (float)"
